titles.title: A joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution relative to contributions and expenditures intended to affect congressional and Presidential elections.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S618-620)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.

bill.summary: 1/21/1993--Introduced. Constitutional Amendment - Declares that the Congress has the power to set reasonable limits on campaign expenditures by, in support of, or in opposition to any candidate in any primary or other election for Federal office. Declares that the States have such power with respect to State or local elections.
